**As a** [role]
 **I need** [function]
 **So that** [benefit]

### Details and Assumptions

* [document what you know]

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
And [certain extra actions are taken] (optional)
Then [the outcome of action is observed]
```
